data.name: 0000 (197.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi always seems so self-assured…

data.name: 0001 (197.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Where does that confidence come from?

data.name: 0002 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you talking about? Koizumi is always humble? Where'd self-assured come from?

data.name: 0003 (197.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi appears to be fooled into thinking Koizumi is a humble man.

data.name: 0004 (197.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: He always talks big about making the right choice. Even just a moment ago.

data.name: 0005 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well that's just how careful he is at thinking things through.

data.name: 0006 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You should learn from that, Kyon.

data.name: 0007 (197.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …I can't be that self-assured--I'm petite bourgeoise by birthright.

data.name: 0008 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Koizumi always seems to say things as they are, right?

data.name: 0009 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right. Totally different to Kyon.

data.name: 0010 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-well Kyon actually said he thinks Koizumi is very self-assured...

data.name: 0011 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What makes him think he can say that?

data.name: 0012 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well I'm not sure specifically--just that he said Koizumi is self-assured…

data.name: 0013 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That must be it then--Kyon is lacking in confidence, basically.

data.name: 0014 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't think that's true.

data.name: 0015 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: He's always trying his hardest, and stuff…

data.name: 0016 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru, going easy on Kyon does no good for the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0017 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right! Next time, let's hold a camp to give Kyon some confidence.

data.name: 0018 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This time we're investigating the unnatural, but next time we'll be giving Kyon discipline.

data.name: 0019 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Not a bad idea if I do say so myself.

data.name: 0020 (197.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hang in there, Kyon…

data.name: 0021 (197.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Regarding Itsuki Koizumi.

data.name: 0022 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's this about Koizumi?

data.name: 0023 (197.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: He values his own ability as accurate and objective.

data.name: 0024 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In other words, you're saying he's self-assured, right?

data.name: 0025 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi simply has above average looks and brains.

data.name: 0026 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who can blame him for having confidence in himself?

data.name: 0027 (197.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Right.

data.name: 0028 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He is a talent I scouted for the SOS Brigade myself, after all.

data.name: 0029 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Very much unlike Kyon.

data.name: 0030 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, do I seem self-assured from your point of view?

data.name: 0031 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's this all of a sudden?

data.name: 0032 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It appears I present such an image to those around me…

data.name: 0033 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't need to be so indirect about it--I know you're talking about Kyon.

data.name: 0034 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, that's not exactly…

data.name: 0035 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is simply that I strive to take action with extreme caution―

data.name: 0036 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As a result, my choices always happen to turn out to be correct.

data.name: 0037 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's not self-assured, you just have the experience to effectively get things done.

data.name: 0038 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You have absolutely nothing to worry about.

data.name: 0039 (197.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's a great help to receive your assurance.

data.name: 0040 (197.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good grief, Kyon is seriously good for nothing.
